Package game.entities.players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
game.entities.GameObject
game.entities.players.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollidingObject, GravityObject, SolidCollider
Direct Known Subclasses:
AIPlayer, PlayerMP
public class Player
extends GameObject
implements SolidCollider, GravityObject

    • collide

      public boolean collide​(CollidingObject o, double vel, boolean xAxis)
      Checks if a movement will cause a collision with a given object, taking into account immunity and ghost mode
      Parameters:
      o - The object for which you want to test collisions
      vel - The velocity of the movement
      xAxis - A boolean indicating whether the movement is happening on the x-axis or not
      Returns:
      A boolean representing if a given movement will cause collision with the given object
